Articles.Content: I have a module installed that gave me cool looking space station module pieces and included a piece for docking (which I dont use because I use stoles docking clamps) and it has a piece that is used to connect more modules. I can't seem to figure out how to connect the modules to it though. I can't remember what mod it is and im not home to look. I was just hoping someone knew off the top! For now I've just been connecting pieces using docking ports.
Erkles clamps. Sorry for the typos, trying not to get caught on my phone by the boss:) I can give more info and pics later tonight if needed.
Of course I forgot to check when I got home, however im fairly positive it is expi.

It is the expi parts. I had some parts in space and there was a docking clamp from Erkles clamps on them and the piece from expi that says it is for connecting more modules. I just can't figure how to connect additional modules to it while in orbit.

It's this common berthing module I don't know how to use. Currently I drag pieces to my station atop my rocket and command module, dock the piee with a docking clam, disconnect the command module and fly home.
Im considering making some station parts focused on reducing lag. Wont be as pretty mind you
